statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); if git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "(detached)"); git_info=" [$branch]"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "%s@%s:%s%s | %s (%s)" "$user" "$(hostname -s)" "$dir" "$git_info" "$model" "$style"
